ReplicaNumberMessage.summary: This class represent an immutable message that allow you send a messageto the replicas when this is ready, this class is call when all replicas are ready and when a new replica is arrived.

ReplicaNumberMessageC.summary: This costructor allow you create an instance of this class.
ReplicaNumberMessageC.param: Parameter that represent actual id to replica
Parameter that represent actual view in the system

Id.summary: This event allow you to write the result of the readall operation inside texbox.

View.summary: This event allow you to write the result of the general operation inside texbox i.e. insert, update and delete.
